conversations.description: User requests a full pitch deck for a SaaS B2B startup focused on remote team productivity, including market sizing, 5‑year financials, founder bios, slides, speaker notes, and investor Q&A.
User asks to research the market for electric‑vehicle charging stations in Europe, extract TAM, growth rate, and top competitors, then embed the data into a market slide.
User provides pricing, churn, and CAC assumptions for a subscription app and wants a 5‑year financial model exported as CSV and visualized in a revenue chart slide.
User supplies the name of a founder, wants a concise professional bio pulled from LinkedIn and Crunchbase for the team slide.
User wants a minimalist pitch deck theme for a health‑tech wearable, with each slide containing specific bullet points and a custom product image.
User asks for speaker notes tailored to a board of angel investors, covering each slide’s key talking points and storytelling tips.
User requests a list of likely investor questions for a fintech platform and brief, data‑driven answers to rehearse the Q&A session.
User wants to store the entire project (market data, financial model, slides) under the name “AI Tutor Project” and retrieve it later for editing.
User seeks a quick market overview for the renewable‑energy storage sector, with a slide showing market trends and a competitor matrix.
User asks the agent to generate a slide on go‑to‑market strategy for a new chatbot product, including partnership ideas and sales funnel metrics.
User asks for an investor‑ready executive summary slide that condenses the entire deck into a one‑page snapshot.
User provides a rough outline of a pitch deck and wants the agent to flesh out each slide with detailed bullet points and relevant charts.
User wants a financial sensitivity analysis table showing best‑case, base‑case, and worst‑case scenarios for a new marketplace.
User asks for a competitive landscape slide that visualizes market share percentages of the top five rivals using a pie chart.
User wants to benchmark their startup’s CAC against industry averages and include the comparison in a unit economics slide.
User asks the agent to pull a recent Gartner report on AI analytics, extract key trends, and turn them into a slide with supporting citations.
User needs a concise founder bio for a serial entrepreneur with multiple exits, formatted for the team slide.
User wants a product demo slide with embedded high‑resolution screenshots and a brief narrative describing the user journey.
User asks for a fundraising ask slide that breaks down the requested amount, equity offered, and planned allocation of funds.
User wants a risk mitigation slide that lists top three business risks and the strategies to address each.
User asks for a growth trajectory slide that visualizes projected monthly active users over the next 36 months.
User provides a list of target investors and wants a tailored pitch deck version that emphasizes metrics each investor cares about.
User wants a slide highlighting social impact metrics for a climate‑tech startup, including CO₂ reduction estimates.
User asks the agent to draft an email pitch attaching the generated deck and a custom cover note for a seed fund.
User wants a slide that explains the technology stack and IP protection strategy for a blockchain‑based platform.
User asks for a quick market validation slide using recent survey data pulled via web search.
User wants a slide summarizing key milestones achieved to date, such as product launch dates, user acquisition numbers, and partnerships.
User requests a slide with an org chart showing current team composition and planned hires over the next two years.
User wants a slide showcasing media coverage and press mentions, including logos and brief excerpts.
User asks for a slide comparing subscription pricing tiers and projected ARPU for each tier.
User wants a slide that outlines regulatory compliance steps required for a health‑data startup operating in the EU.
User requests speaker notes that incorporate storytelling hooks for the problem slide to capture investor attention.
User asks for a slide with a funnel visualization of the customer acquisition process, from awareness to conversion.
User wants a slide that details the exit strategy options, including acquisition targets and IPO timeline.
User asks the agent to generate a slide with a SWOT analysis for the startup, formatted as a four‑quadrant chart.
User wants a slide that presents key performance indicators (KPIs) tracked monthly, such as churn, LTV, and CAC payback period.
User requests a slide with a timeline roadmap showing product feature releases for the next 18 months.
User asks for a slide that summarizes the total addressable market broken down by geographic segments.
User wants a slide with a bar chart comparing the startup’s cost structure against industry benchmarks.
User asks for a slide that showcases customer testimonials and case study snippets to build credibility.
User wants a slide describing the go‑to‑market partnership ecosystem, including channel partners and reseller plans.
User asks for a slide that highlights the startup’s unique value proposition in one succinct sentence and supporting points.
User wants a slide that presents the current burn rate and runway calculations based on the latest financial model.
User asks the agent to draft a concise “Ask” slide that includes valuation expectations and potential investor upside.
User wants a slide that visualizes the product architecture diagram with labeled components and data flow.
User asks for a slide that outlines the legal entity structure, ownership percentages, and cap table after funding.
User wants a slide that lists key advisors and board members, with brief bios and areas of expertise.
User requests a slide that presents the competitive advantage matrix, mapping features versus competitors.
User asks for a slide summarizing recent traction metrics: sign‑ups, revenue, NPS, and churn over the past quarter.
User wants a slide that details the pricing strategy, including discounts for early adopters and enterprise bundles.
User asks for a slide that explains the data privacy safeguards and GDPR compliance measures implemented.
User wants a slide that showcases the roadmap for international expansion, highlighting target markets and timelines.
User asks the agent to generate speaker notes for the financials slide, emphasizing growth assumptions and risk mitigation.
User wants a slide that outlines the fundraising timeline, key milestones, and expected closing dates.
User asks for a final thank‑you slide with contact information, social media handles, and a call‑to‑action for follow‑up.
